welcome.title: Welcome to Echoma
welcome.description: Echoma is a secure, private emotion tracking app that helps you monitor and manage your emotional well-being.

record.title: Record Your Emotions
record.description: Select your current emotion, set the intensity, and add a description. Your data is encrypted and stored securely to ensure privacy.

timeline.title: View Timeline
timeline.description: View all your records in the timeline, use search and filter features to quickly find the records you need.

ai.title: Get AI Suggestions
ai.description: After each record, you can get personalized AI analysis suggestions to help you better understand and manage your emotions.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All data is encrypted. You can choose to store locally or upload to the blockchain (Walrus), completely under your control.

common.testnetNotice: ‚ö†Ô∏è This app is currently running on Sui Testnet for testing purposes only
common.mainnetNotice: ‚úÖ Connected to Sui Mainnet. Transactions are live.

password.setupDescription: To protect your emotion records, please set up a strong password. The password will be used to encrypt your data and will not be stored or uploaded.
password.setupWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Please remember your password! If you forget it, you will not be able to decrypt your data. We recommend using a password manager or writing down a hint.
password.passwordPlaceholder: At least 8 characters with letters and numbers/symbols
password.hintPlaceholder: A hint to help you remember (do not include the password itself)
password.hintDescription: The hint will be stored in plain text. Do not include the password or sensitive information.
password.inputDescription: Please enter your encryption password to continue
password.resetDescription: Change your encryption password. All data will be re-encrypted with the new password.
password.resetWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This will re-encrypt all local data. Make sure to enter the correct old password, or your data may not be recoverable.

share.title: Share Record
share.description: Select who to share with, or enter a custom address
share.selectOption: Please select who to share with
share.policyNotFound: Cannot verify access policy. This NFT may not have been minted with Seal Access Policies.
share.policyNotFoundHint: If the NFT was indeed minted with Seal Access Policies, it may be an indexing delay. Please wait 10-30 seconds and try again by closing and reopening this dialog.
share.publicRecord: This is a public record. Anyone can access it, no need to share.
share.publicRecordTooltip: Public records do not need to be shared

success.sharedDesc: The address has been granted access to this record

errors.policyCheckFailedDesc: Unable to verify access policy, possibly due to network issues or indexing delays. If the NFT was indeed minted with Seal Access Policies, you can try again later.
errors.registryNotFoundDesc: Please deploy Seal Access Policies contract first
errors.publicRecordDesc: Public records are accessible to anyone, no need to grant access to specific addresses.
errors.cannotGrantToSelfDesc: You as the NFT owner already have access permission, no need to grant access to yourself.
errors.alreadyAuthorizedDesc: This address already has access permission, no need to grant again.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.message: Echoma provides emotion recording and general support only, and cannot replace professional medical advice.

index.title: Echoma
index.subtitle: Your emotions, encrypted and preserved on-chain
index.anonymousModeDesc: Record emotions using your wallet. Data encrypted locally with wallet signatures.
index.secureModeDesc: Sign in for cloud backup and enhanced security. Access from any device.
index.feature1Desc: Your emotions are encrypted before leaving your device
index.feature2Desc: Decentralized, verifiable storage for your encrypted data
index.step1: Record your emotion with AI-assisted analysis
index.step3: Upload encrypted data to Walrus storage
index.step4: Mint verification NFT on Sui blockchain
index.builtFor: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è in Taiwan for Haulout Hackathon

record.title: Record Your Emotion
record.subtitle: Capture this moment, encrypted and verified on-chain
record.requiredFieldsHint: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please select an emotion and describe what happened before recording
record.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the event that triggered this emotion... (will be encrypted)
record.descriptionHint: üîí Your description will be encrypted on the client side before storage
record.onChainWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This caption will be stored on-chain. Please avoid personal identifiers or full sensitive content.
record.tagsDesc: Add tags to categorize and find records (optional)

privacy.title: Privacy Control (Seal Permissions)
privacy.publicDesc: üåê Encrypted with public Seal key - anyone can verify proof and decrypt content
privacy.privateDesc: üîí Encrypted with your exclusive key - only you (with authorized key) can decrypt and access

storage.title: Choose Storage Method
storage.localOnly: Save to local browser only, do not upload to Walrus
storage.walrusOnly: Only attempt to upload to Walrus, will not save on failure
storage.walletRequired: ‚ö†Ô∏è Wallet connection required to upload emotions to Walrus
storage.walrusHint: Using Walrus storage means your emotion records will be stored on decentralized storage, and no third party can decrypt them.
storage.epochDesc: Select the number of epochs to store data on Walrus Testnet (1 epoch ‚âà 1 day)

backup.title: Backup to Database
backup.description: Backup encrypted data to Supabase, recoverable even if Walrus expires
backup.descriptionDisabled: No backup, data only exists on Walrus (testnet data may expire)
backup.anonymousWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Anonymous mode requires Supabase login to backup
backup.cannotBackupDesc: Anonymous mode requires Supabase login to backup. Data has been uploaded to Walrus.
backup.backupFailedDesc: Data has been uploaded to Walrus, but backup to database failed.

status.uploadingWithFallback: Uploading to Walrus (will save locally on failure)...

hint.local: üíæ Your emotion snapshot will be encrypted and saved only to your local browser, not uploaded to Walrus
hint.walrus: üí° Your emotion snapshot will be encrypted and stored on Walrus, with an NFT minted on Sui as proof

errors.missingInfoDesc: Please select an emotion and add a description.
errors.aiErrorDesc: Unable to get AI response, please try again later.
errors.rateLimitExceededDesc: You have reached the usage limit, please try again later.
errors.serviceUnavailableDesc: Walrus storage service is currently unavailable. Please try again later or check your network connection.
errors.networkErrorDesc: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again.
errors.uploadFailedDesc: Unable to upload data to storage service. Please try again later.
errors.encryptionErrorDesc: An error occurred during data encryption. Please try again.
errors.dataTooLargeDesc: Your input is too long. Please shorten your description and try again.
errors.storageQuotaExceededDesc: Browser local storage is full. Please clear browser data or delete some old records and try again.
errors.nftMintFailedDesc: Record saved to Walrus, but NFT minting failed

success.recordedLocalServer: Walrus service temporarily unavailable, data saved to local server.
success.recordedWithNFT: Record saved and minted as NFT! NFT ID: {{nftId}}...
success.recordedWithSealPolicies:
Record saved and minted as NFT (Seal Access Policies enabled)! NFT ID: {{nftId}}...

üí° You can now click the "Share Record" button below the "Storage Settings" area on the right to authorize specific addresses to access this record.
success.recordedButNFTFailed: Record saved to Walrus, but NFT minting failed. You can view the record in Timeline and retry minting later.
success.uploadingDesc: Encrypting and saving your emotion snapshot

wallet.insufficientBalanceDesc: Please ensure you have enough SUI and WAL testnet tokens.
wallet.signFailedDesc: Wallet signature failed, please try again.

nft.mintDesc: Mint this record as an NFT on Sui blockchain, permanently saved and verifiable
nft.mintDisabledDesc: Only save to Walrus, don't mint NFT
nft.sealPoliciesHint: üí° Seal Access Policies can only be used when minting NFTs

sealPolicies.enabledDesc: Enable on-chain access policies, can authorize others to access
sealPolicies.disabledDesc: Use traditional method, don't record access policies
sealPolicies.registryNotFoundDesc: Please deploy Seal Access Policies contract first
sealPolicies.registryNotFoundTooltip: PolicyRegistry not found. Cannot use Seal Access Policies. Please deploy the contract first or uncheck Seal Access Policies.
sealPolicies.requiresNFTDesc: Seal Access Policies can only be used when minting NFTs. Please enable "Mint as NFT" first.

share.successDesc: The address has been granted access to this record

nftMinted.title: ‚úÖ NFT Successfully Minted! You can now:
nftMinted.shareOption: Click the "Share Record" button below to authorize specific addresses to access
nftMinted.timelineOption: Or directly return to Timeline to view records

policyVerification.pending: Policy verification in progress, please wait... Share feature may be temporarily unavailable
policyVerification.pendingTooltip: Policy verification in progress, please wait...

timeline.title: Emotion Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Your personal emotion journey record
timeline.testnetWarning: Testnet data will be deleted after epochs expire
timeline.testnetWarningDesc: It is recommended to enable 'Backup to Database' for permanent storage
timeline.encryptedContent: üîí This record is encrypted, description content is protected
timeline.walrusSaved: This emotion has been permanently saved to Walrus, Blob ID: {{blobId}}
timeline.queryingOnChainDesc: Fetching your Walrus records from Sui blockchain, please wait
timeline.queryFailedDesc: Unable to query Walrus records from chain, please try again later
timeline.decryptFailedDesc: Unable to decrypt this record, it may have expired or been corrupted
timeline.decryptNetworkError: Network error. Check your connection and try again
timeline.decryptNotFound: Data not found. It may have expired or been removed
timeline.decryptKeyError: Unable to generate decryption key. Please ensure you are logged in or have a wallet connected
timeline.decryptServiceUnavailable: Storage service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later
timeline.decryptInvalidData: Invalid data format, unable to decrypt
timeline.decryptErrorUnsupportedVersion: Unsupported encryption format version, please update the app
timeline.walrusAggregatorNotice:
‚ö†Ô∏è Walrus Testnet Aggregator Service Unstable

Your data has been successfully uploaded to the chain (viewable on SuiScan), but the Walrus Aggregator is currently unable to provide download services. This is a known issue on testnet. Please try again later.

errorSuggestion.dataExpired: Data may have expired or been deleted
errorSuggestion.contactSupport: If the problem persists, contact technical support
errorSuggestion.checkLogin: Please ensure you are logged in correctly
errorSuggestion.checkWallet: Please ensure your wallet is properly connected
errorSuggestion.checkPassword: Please verify your password or key is correct
errorSuggestion.updateApp: Please update the app to the latest version

timeline.exportFormat:
Choose export format:
OK = CSV, Cancel = JSON
timeline.exportDialogDesc: Choose export format and options ({{count}} records total)
timeline.onlineDesc: You can continue using all features.
timeline.offlineDesc: You can only view already loaded records.
timeline.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} records? This action cannot be undone.
timeline.noSelectionDesc: Please select records to export first
timeline.accessControlDesc: Manage access permissions for this record, grant or revoke access to others
timeline.accessControlUpdatedDesc: Access permissions have been successfully updated
timeline.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This action cannot be undone.
timeline.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters
timeline.getStartedDesc: Select an emotion, fill in a description, and save your first record.

decryptAll.noRecordsDesc: All records are already decrypted or do not need decryption

syncNFTs.tooltip: Sync all NFT records from blockchain to database
syncNFTs.needWalletDesc: Please connect your wallet to sync on-chain records
syncNFTs.needLoginDesc: Please login to Supabase to save records
syncNFTs.successDesc: Synced {{synced}} new NFTs, skipped {{skipped}} existing records

localStorage.keyMismatchDesc: Encrypted data detected in local storage, but cannot be decrypted with current account. This may be because you switched accounts (wallet/anonymous/login status). Please try switching back to the original account state to access these records.
localStorage.saveBlockedDesc: Encrypted data detected in local storage that cannot be decrypted. This may be because you switched accounts (wallet/anonymous/login status).
localStorage.saveBlockedSolution1: Solution 1: Switch back to the original account state to access these records
localStorage.saveBlockedSolution2: Solution 2: Clear local storage and start fresh (this will delete all local records)
localStorage.saveBlockedNote: Note: After clearing local storage, records that cannot be decrypted will be permanently lost.

auth.title: Secure Mode
auth.subtitle: Sign in to access enhanced features with cloud backup

errors.missingInfoDesc: Please enter both email and password.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPasswordDesc: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

success.accountCreatedDesc: You can now start recording your emotions securely.

wallet.connectDesc: Connect your wallet to start recording emotions and minting NFTs on Sui blockchain.
wallet.disconnectedDesc: Come back anytime to continue your journey.
wallet.supports: Supports Sui Wallet, Suiet, Ethos & more

authRecord.title: Record Your Emotion
authRecord.subtitle: Securely stored with cloud backup
authRecord.descriptionPlaceholder: What's on your mind? Express yourself freely...
authRecord.makePublicDesc: Share this emotion record with others

errors.missingInfoDesc: Please select an emotion and add a description.
errors.notAuthenticatedDesc: Please sign in to record emotions.
errors.aiErrorDesc: Unable to get AI response, please try again later
errors.uploadFailedDesc: Failed to record emotion. Please try again.

success.signedOutDesc: You have been signed out successfully.
success.recordedDesc: Your emotion has been recorded securely.

errors.registryNotFoundDesc: Please deploy Seal Access Policies contract first
errors.alreadyAuthorizedDesc: This address already has access permission, no need to grant again.
errors.notAuthorizedDesc: This address does not have access permission, no need to revoke.
errors.publicRecord: Cannot Grant Access to Public Record
errors.publicRecordDesc: Public records are accessible to anyone, no need to grant access to specific addresses.
errors.cannotGrantToSelfDesc: You as the NFT owner already have access permission, no need to grant access to yourself.

success.grantedDesc: The address has been granted access to this record
success.revokedDesc: The address access has been revoked
success.labelSavedDesc: Address label has been successfully updated

accessControl.registryNotAvailable: PolicyRegistry not available, please deploy contract first
accessControl.publicRecordDesc: This record is public and accessible to anyone
accessControl.grantAccessDesc: Grant an address access to this private record
accessControl.roleHint: Select a role for the authorized person to help identify and manage
accessControl.addressHint: Enter the Sui wallet address to authorize (66 characters)
accessControl.noAuthorizedHint: Click the button above to authorize others to access this record

info.title: On-Chain Verification & Audit
info.verifiable: All authorization operations are recorded on Sui blockchain and publicly verifiable
info.auditable: Complete authorization history is auditable, ensuring transparency of access permissions
info.revocable: Authorization can be revoked at any time and takes effect immediately
